parameters.name: All
parameters.description: Specifies whether to remove all tags from the instances. Default value: No.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instances reside.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The IDs of the instances. Valid values of N: 0 to 49. You can specify up to 50 instances at a time. Example: ResourceId.0, ResourceId.1, ... , ResourceId.49.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. Set the value to **INSTANCE**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The keys of the tag that you want to remove. Valid values of N: 0 to 19. You can specify up to 20 tag keys at a time. Example: Tag.0.Key, Tag.1.Key, ... , Tag.19.Key.
